CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Degree_Earned__c)), 1, 0) +
IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Date_of_Birth__c)), (TODAY() - Date_of_Birth__c) / 365 >= 27, (TODAY() - Date_of_Birth__c) / 365 <= 50 ), 1, 0 ) +
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(RELATIONSHIPS__c, "Married"), ISPICKVAL(RELATIONSHIPS__c, "In A Relationship with Kids") ), 1, 0 ) +
IF( OR( Series_6_License__c, Series_24_License__c, Series_63_License__c, Series_65_License__c, Series_66_License__c, Series_7_License__c, Insurance_Licensed__c ), 1, 0 ) +
IF( AND( OR( State_Province__c = "Nevada", State_Province__c = "Utah" ), Income_Greater_than_75K__c ), 1, 0 ) +
IF( AND( State_Province__c = "California", Greater_than_120K__c ), 1, 0 )
CustomField.label: Candidate Score
